casebody.data:
JP MORGAN CHASE BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION
v.
Jesse J. DAVIS, Jr., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 11, 2017

Jesse J. Davis, Jr., self-represented, and Carolyn S. Davis, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The defendants' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39702) is denied.
